ygData.subject: Re: bug with Sneak?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can t be singing any songs to use it.  Hard to sneak when you re wailing at the top of your lungs.  After all song effects wear off, the sneak button will
ygData.messageBody:
You can't be singing any songs to use it. Hard to sneak when you're
wailing at the top of your lungs. After all song effects wear off, the
sneak button will become active again.


At 12:43 PM 6/10/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "John Rice" <johnrice@...>
>
>
>I have trained up my sneak skill somewhat but am having trouble
>using it. It stays in the depressed position all the time. So
>far I was able to use it once. Is it something bards can only
>use once a week? Does it have to be above a certain level to
>be able to use it? Anyone know the deal?
>
>Berk
>Level 23 bard on Rallos Zek
>
